title: How do I configure my Product IDs for the App stores?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am unable to configure my App IDs for the various stores.

sections.title: Cause
content: The process to configure IAP varies for different stores.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Please see the links below for guidance on registering essential Application details, defining your in-app purchase Product and testing game-to-store product purchase connectivity.

• Amazon Apps, Amazon Underground
  • Apple App Store
  • Google Play Developer Console
  • Windows Store

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information and Community tips, please see this Forum Post.
